availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. Walker (Christian County, Kentucky, miller and Caldwell deputy court clerk)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, miller and deputy court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Walker. Father of S. E. Walker, J. L. Walker, M. E. Walker, and M. A. Walker. Miller in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1860. Deputy court clerk in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 637.
